monolog.line: A single reason : this strong russian accent.
Just imagine grow up with that in the middle of the Cold War.
Anyway, he found a friend in France : Augustin.
Augustin lived in the middle of Montmartre.
A short friendship : he killed himself in the Montmartre's stairs.
Because of this event, Charlie's studies had been redirected.
From philantropism section to mechanics, what a change !
